      <h2 style="font-size: 20px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0 0 20px 0; line-height: 1.4;">What's your biggest concern about AI in your work?</h2>
      <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px;">
        <label style="display: block; background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="if(!this.querySelector('input').checked)this.style.borderColor='#2D2D4A'">
          <input type="radio" name="q9" value="integrity" style="display: none;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Academic integrity and student cheating</div>
        </label>
        <label style="display: block; background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="if(!this.querySelector('input').checked)this.style.borderColor='#2D2D4A'">
          <input type="radio" name="q9" value="ethics" style="display: none;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Ethical implications and responsible use</div>
        </label>
        <label style="display: block; background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="if(!this.querySelector('input').checked)this.style.borderColor='#2D2D4A'">
          <input type="radio" name="q9" value="policy" style="display: none;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Unclear policies and guidelines</div>
        </label>
        <label style="display: block; background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="if(!this.querySelector('input').checked)this.style.borderColor='#2D2D4A'">
          <input type="radio" name="q9" value="skills" style="display: none;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Keeping up with rapidly changing technology</div>
        </label>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Question 10: Goals -->
    <div class="question" data-question="10" style="display: none;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #64748B; letter-spacing: 2px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 8px;">Part C: Learning Preferences</div>
      <h2 style="font-size: 20px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0 0 20px 0; line-height: 1.4;">What would success look like for you?</h2>
      <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px;">
        <label style="display: block; background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="if(!this.querySelector('input').checked)this.style.borderColor='#2D2D4A'">
          <input type="radio" name="q10" value="understand" style="display: none;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Understand what AI can and can't do</div>
        </label>
        <label style="display: block; background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="if(!this.querySelector('input').checked)this.style.borderColor='#2D2D4A'">
          <input type="radio" name="q10" value="practical" style="display: none;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Use AI daily to save time and improve quality</div>
        </label>
        <label style="display: block; background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="if(!this.querySelector('input').checked)this.style.borderColor='#2D2D4A'">
          <input type="radio" name="q10" value="confidence" style="display: none;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Feel confident discussing AI with students/colleagues</div>
        </label>
        <label style="display: block; background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="if(!this.querySelector('input').checked)this.style.borderColor='#2D2D4A'">
          <input type="radio" name="q10" value="lead" style="display: none;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Help shape AI policy and practice in my area</div>
        </label>
      </div>
    </div>

  </div>

  <!-- Navigation -->
  <div id="nav-container" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-top: 24px;">
    <button id="prev-btn" onclick="previousQuestion()" disabled style="background: #2D2D4A; color: #64748B; border: none; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 14px; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.5;">
      ‚Üê Previous
    </button>
    <button id="next-btn" onclick="nextQuestion()" disabled style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4F46E5, #7C3AED); color: white; border: none; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 14px; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.5;">
      Next ‚Üí
    </button>
  </div>

  <!-- Results Container (hidden initially) -->
  <div id="results-container" style="display: none;">
    <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0D2818, #1A3A2A); border: 2px solid #22C55E; border-radius: 16px; padding: 32px; margin-bottom: 24px;">
      <div style="font-size: 48px; margin-bottom: 12px; text-align: center;" id="result-emoji">üéØ</div>
      <h2 id="result-title" style="font-size: 22px; color: #86EFAC; margin: 0 0 12px 0; text-align: center;">Your Recommended Path</h2>
      <p id="result-description" style="font-size: 15px; color: #4ADE80; line-height: 1.6; text-align: center; margin: 0;"></p>
    </div>

    <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #64748B; letter-spacing: 2px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px;">Recommended Starting Experience</div>
    <div id="recommended-experience" style="background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #4F46E5; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 24px;">
      <!-- Filled by JS -->
    </div>

    <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #64748B; letter-spacing: 2px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px;">Your Suggested Pathway</div>
    <div id="pathway-list" style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px; margin-bottom: 24px;">
      <!-- Filled by JS -->
    </div>

    <div style="background: #16162A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 24px;">
      <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #64748B; margin: 0; line-height: 1.6;">
        <strong>Remember:</strong> There's no required order. These are just suggestions based on your responses. You can start with any experience that interests you.
      </p>
    </div>

    <div style="display: flex; gap: 12px; flex-wrap: wrap;">
      <a href="#" id="start-btn" style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px; display: block; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4F46E5, #7C3AED); color: white; text-decoration: none; padding: 14px 24px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;">
        Start First Experience
      </a>
      <button onclick="restartQuiz()" style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px; background: #16162A; color: #4F46E5; border: 2px solid #4F46E5; padding: 14px 24px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer;">
        Retake Quiz
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>

</div>

<script>
(function() {
  const TOTAL_QUESTIONS = 10;
  let currentQuestion = 1;
  const answers = {};

  // Experience data
  const experiences = {
    'is-this-ai': {
      emoji: 'üîç',
      title: 'Is This AI?',
      subtitle: 'Detection & Awareness',
      time: '15-60 min',
      description: 'Learn to identify AI-generated content and understand detection tool limitations.',
      url: 'https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749313_1/xid-91749313_1'
    },
    'what-would-you-do': {
      emoji: 'ü§î',
      title: 'What Would You Do?',
      subtitle: 'Ethics & Dilemmas',
      time: '20-90 min',
      description: 'Navigate real-world AI dilemmas and build your personal ethical framework.',
      url: 'https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749316_1/xid-91749316_1'
    },
    'rules-of-engagement': {
      emoji: 'üìã',
      title: 'Rules of Engagement',
      subtitle: 'Policy & Governance',
      time: '30-120 min',
      description: 'Create and stress-test AI use policies for your context.',
      url: 'https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749314_1/xid-91749314_1'
    },
    'ai-proof-assessments': {
      emoji: 'üõ°Ô∏è',
      title: 'AI-Proof Your Assessments',
      subtitle: 'Assessment Design',
      time: '45-75 min',
      description: 'Transform your assessments to be resilient in an AI era.',
      url: 'https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749315_1/xid-91749315_1'
    },
    'teaching-with-ai': {
      emoji: 'ü§ù',
      title: 'Working WITH AI',
      subtitle: 'Co-Creation & Integration',
      time: '30-60 min',
      description: 'Master prompting techniques and build a reusable prompt library.',
      url: 'https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749312_1/xid-91749312_1'
    }
  };

  // Profile-based recommendations
  const profiles = {
    'new-to-ai': {
      emoji: 'üå±',
      title: 'Getting Started',
      description: 'You\'re at the beginning of your AI journey. Start with understanding what AI can and can\'t do before diving into practical applications.',
      firstExperience: 'is-this-ai',
      pathway: ['is-this-ai', 'what-would-you-do', 'rules-of-engagement', 'teaching-with-ai', 'ai-proof-assessments']
    },
    'ethics-focused': {
      emoji: '‚öñÔ∏è',
      title: 'Ethics First',
      description: 'Your primary concern is doing the right thing with AI. Building an ethical foundation first will help you navigate other decisions confidently.',
      firstExperience: 'what-would-you-do',
      pathway: ['what-would-you-do', 'rules-of-engagement', 'is-this-ai', 'ai-proof-assessments', 'teaching-with-ai']
    },
    'assessment-focused': {
      emoji: 'üìù',
      title: 'Assessment Designer',
      description: 'Assessment integrity is your top priority. Start by learning to design AI-resilient assessments, then build supporting skills.',
      firstExperience: 'ai-proof-assessments',
      pathway: ['ai-proof-assessments', 'is-this-ai', 'teaching-with-ai', 'rules-of-engagement', 'what-would-you-do']
    },
    'practical-skills': {
      emoji: 'üõ†Ô∏è',
      title: 'Practical Implementer',
      description: 'You want to use AI effectively right away. Start with practical skills, then build policy and ethical understanding around your practice.',
      firstExperience: 'teaching-with-ai',
      pathway: ['teaching-with-ai', 'ai-proof-assessments', 'rules-of-engagement', 'what-would-you-do', 'is-this-ai']
    },
    'policy-focused': {
      emoji: 'üìã',
      title: 'Policy Builder',
      description: 'Clear guidelines matter most to you. Start with policy, then build practical skills within that framework.',
      firstExperience: 'rules-of-engagement',
      pathway: ['rules-of-engagement', 'what-would-you-do', 'is-this-ai', 'ai-proof-assessments', 'teaching-with-ai']
    }
  };

  function updateProgress() {
    const percent = Math.round(((currentQuestion - 1) / TOTAL_QUESTIONS) * 100);
    document.getElementById('progress-bar').style.width = percent + '%';
    document.getElementById('progress-label').textContent = `Question ${currentQuestion} of ${TOTAL_QUESTIONS}`;
    document.getElementById('progress-percent').textContent = percent + '%';
  }

  function updateNavigation() {
    const prevBtn = document.getElementById('prev-btn');
    const nextBtn = document.getElementById('next-btn');

    prevBtn.disabled = currentQuestion === 1;
    prevBtn.style.opacity = currentQuestion === 1 ? '0.5' : '1';
    prevBtn.style.cursor = currentQuestion === 1 ? 'not-allowed' : 'pointer';

    const hasAnswer = answers['q' + currentQuestion];
    nextBtn.disabled = !hasAnswer;
    nextBtn.style.opacity = hasAnswer ? '1' : '0.5';
    nextBtn.style.cursor = hasAnswer ? 'pointer' : 'not-allowed';
    nextBtn.textContent = currentQuestion === TOTAL_QUESTIONS ? 'See Results' : 'Next ‚Üí';
  }

  function showQuestion(num) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.question').forEach(q => q.style.display = 'none');
    const question = document.querySelector(`.question[data-question="${num}"]`);
    if (question) question.style.display = 'block';
    updateProgress();
    updateNavigation();
  }

  window.nextQuestion = function() {
    if (currentQuestion < TOTAL_QUESTIONS) {
      currentQuestion++;
      showQuestion(currentQuestion);
    } else {
      showResults();
    }
  };

  window.previousQuestion = function() {
    if (currentQuestion > 1) {
      currentQuestion--;
      showQuestion(currentQuestion);
    }
  };

  function determineProfile() {
    // Score different profiles based on answers
    const scores = {
      'new-to-ai': 0,
      'ethics-focused': 0,
      'assessment-focused': 0,
      'practical-skills': 0,
      'policy-focused': 0
    };

    // AI experience level (Q3, Q4, Q6)
    if (answers.q3 === 'never' || answers.q3 === 'rarely') scores['new-to-ai'] += 3;
    if (answers.q4 === 'none' || answers.q4 === 'basic') scores['new-to-ai'] += 2;
    if (answers.q6 === 'not-confident') scores['new-to-ai'] += 2;

    // Primary concerns (Q9)
    if (answers.q9 === 'integrity') scores['assessment-focused'] += 3;
    if (answers.q9 === 'ethics') scores['ethics-focused'] += 3;
    if (answers.q9 === 'policy') scores['policy-focused'] += 3;
    if (answers.q9 === 'skills') scores['practical-skills'] += 2;

    // Goals (Q10)
    if (answers.q10 === 'understand') scores['new-to-ai'] += 2;
    if (answers.q10 === 'practical') scores['practical-skills'] += 3;
    if (answers.q10 === 'lead') scores['policy-focused'] += 2;

    // Interest area (Q2)
    if (answers.q2 === 'assessment') scores['assessment-focused'] += 2;
    if (answers.q2 === 'content') scores['practical-skills'] += 2;
    if (answers.q2 === 'efficiency') scores['practical-skills'] += 1;

    // Role adjustments (Q1)
    if (answers.q1 === 'teaching' && answers.q2 === 'assessment') scores['assessment-focused'] += 1;
    if (answers.q1 === 'admin') scores['practical-skills'] += 1;

    // Find highest scoring profile
    let maxScore = 0;
    let profile = 'new-to-ai';
    for (const [key, score] of Object.entries(scores)) {
      if (score > maxScore) {
        maxScore = score;
        profile = key;
      }
    }

    return profile;
  }

  function showResults() {
    document.getElementById('questions-container').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('nav-container').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('progress-container').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('results-container').style.display = 'block';

    const profileKey = determineProfile();
    const profile = profiles[profileKey];
    const firstExp = experiences[profile.firstExperience];

    // Save results
    const results = {
      answers: answers,
      profile: profileKey,
      pathway: profile.pathway,
      timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
    };
    localStorage.setItem('ai-passport-quiz-results', JSON.stringify(results));

    // Update UI
    document.getElementById('result-emoji').textContent = profile.emoji;
    document.getElementById('result-title').textContent = profile.title;
    document.getElementById('result-description').textContent = profile.description;

    // Recommended first experience
    document.getElementById('recommended-experience').innerHTML = `
      <div style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 16px;">
        <span style="font-size: 32px;">${firstExp.emoji}</span>
        <div style="flex: 1;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 17px; color: #E2E8F0; margin-bottom: 2px;">${firstExp.title}</div>
          <div style="font-size: 13px; color: #4F46E5; margin-bottom: 6px;">${firstExp.subtitle} ‚Ä¢ ${firstExp.time}</div>
          <div style="font-size: 14px; color: #64748B; line-height: 1.5;">${firstExp.description}</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    `;

    // Pathway list
    const pathwayHtml = profile.pathway.map((expKey, idx) => {
      const exp = experiences[expKey];
      const isFirst = idx === 0;
      return `
        <a href="${exp.url}" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none; display: block;">
          <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; padding: 12px 16px; background: ${isFirst ? '#1E1B4B' : '#16162A'}; border-radius: 8px; ${isFirst ? 'border: 2px solid #4F46E5;' : ''}">
            <span style="font-size: 20px;">${exp.emoji}</span>
            <div style="flex: 1;">
              <div style="font-weight: ${isFirst ? 'bold' : 'normal'}; color: #E2E8F0; font-size: 14px;">${exp.title}</div>
            </div>
            <span style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 12px; color: #94A3B8;">${idx + 1}</span>
          </div>
        </a>
      `;
    }).join('');
    document.getElementById('pathway-list').innerHTML = pathwayHtml;

    // Update start button
    document.getElementById('start-btn').textContent = `Start: ${firstExp.title}`;
    document.getElementById('start-btn').href = firstExp.url;
    document.getElementById('start-btn').target = '_blank';
  }

  window.restartQuiz = function() {
    currentQuestion = 1;
    Object.keys(answers).forEach(key => delete answers[key]);

    document.querySelectorAll('input[type="radio"]').forEach(input => {
      input.checked = false;
      input.closest('label').style.borderColor = '#2D2D4A';
      input.closest('label').style.background = '#16162A';
    });

    document.getElementById('questions-container').style.display = 'block';
    document.getElementById('nav-container').style.display = 'flex';
    document.getElementById('progress-container').style.display = 'block';
    document.getElementById('results-container').style.display = 'none';

    showQuestion(1);
  };

  // Handle option selection
  document.addEventListener('change', function(e) {
    if (e.target.type === 'radio') {
      const questionDiv = e.target.closest('.question');
      answers[e.target.name] = e.target.value;

      // Update visual state
      questionDiv.querySelectorAll('label').forEach(label => {
        label.style.borderColor = '#2D2D4A';
        label.style.background = '#16162A';
      });
      e.target.closest('label').style.borderColor = '#4F46E5';
      e.target.closest('label').style.background = '#1E1B4B';

      updateNavigation();
    }
  });

  // Initialize
  updateProgress();
  updateNavigation();
})();
</script>
